ComicInfo.Penciller: Daniel Leister,Jean-Paul Deshong,JM Ringuet,Daniel Leister,Jean-Paul Deshong,JM Ringuet
ComicInfo.Summary: 'INTERDIMENSIONAL WOMEN'S PRISON BREAKOUT,' Part One A portal has opened in NYC, letting out womanhood's worst! DR. WEIR! APRIL FOOL! And BOMB QUEEN! With Vlad too sick to move, Cassie will have to call SAMHAIN for back up! But who's a bigger threat to the world? The ladies or Sam? Also includes an installment of Hoax Hunters by Steve Seeley, Michael Morici, and J.M. Ringuey, and The Corpse by James Lowder and Jean-Paul Deshong.
ComicInfo.Title: Interdimensional Women's Prison Breakout, Part 1
